companies.title: portchain
companies.description:
copenhagen, denmark

Remote Senior Software Engineer
[June 2017 - June 2018]

Working remotely with Portchain, I was responsible for building the prototype of the new application, using NodeJS and MarkoJS to be used for demonstrations and planning future product development.

companies.title: adelphi digital
companies.description:
sydney, australia

Lead Drupal Engineer
[September 2016 - January 2017]

Working at Adelphi as a lead developer, I was responsible for overseeing website development from the initial client request through to the final build. Working alongside the head of PHP, I helped restructure the companies development processes and helped to reorganise the way in which we plan and develop each site. During this time, I was also involved with implementing new continuous integration tools and techniques, using Git and Jenkins as our CI tool to allow us to deploy to staging and production environments. I worked with an internationally distributed team of developers, and helped to mentor the junior developers while providing assistance and support to the more experienced developers.

companies.title: iag
companies.description:
sydney, australia

Senior Web Developer
[March 2016 - September 2016]

I was responsible for assisting a team of developers in the rebuild of the NRMA website. Working along side the frontend team and the content team, I assisted in the development of a sustainable website that offers flexibility and ease-of-use while the website organically grows and expands as content requirements change.

companies.title: nation
companies.description:
london, united kingdom

Senior Web Developer
[October 2013 - February 2016]

Working at Nation has given me extensive experience in website development, allowing me to work closely with all the teams in the department to plan, scope and build responsive websites. I worked closely alongside the project management team to help introduce and implement Agile workflow into our project process. I also had the chance to experiment with mobile application development, and built an Android app currently available for download on Google Play.
